job_description: Hootsuite Media IncPosition Title: Co-op Software Engineer, JavaScriptLocation: 5 East 8th Avenue, Vancouver, BC  Co-op Term: 4, 8, or 12 months terms availableStart Date: May 2015 About Hootsuite:At Hootsuite, all co-op students pair with a mentor on a small team to build and ship production-ready code in modern languages. There are continual opportunities to create and learn from shipping code on day one to mission-critical multi-month projects. You'll play a role in shaping our product and our culture.The work I did was real work, not intern-pet-projects, not endless low priority bug-fixes, but important things, things that required trust, support, that were challenging, and that were needed for Hootsuite and their users.- John Giannakos, September to January 2014Our motto is learning happens in production. We practice continuous delivery, and ship new code to production multiple times each day in order to test hypotheses about our changes. We value autonomy, curiosity, and entrepreneurialism. We want teammates who participate, challenge us, ask hard questions, and drive continuous improvement.Interested in our past Co-op’s experiences? Check out Leo’s experience at HootsuiteHootsuite is looking for an exceptional Co-op to join the team for a 4, 8 or 12 month term at our HQ in Vancouver, British Columbia. You will tackle technical problems, build functionality for new product initiatives, receive outstanding mentorship, and learn about working on large-scale, highly available web and mobile products.Want to know what we’re working on? Visit our Engineering blog at code.hootsuite.comResponsibilities:● Build and ship the next generation of critical social media services● Participate in code reviews and design reviews to continually improve your craft and approach to problem solving● Collaborate in small teams to design, build, and ship high quality software to Hootsuite's customers● Iterate in an agile fashion; creating hypotheses and testing them with incremental code shipmentsWhy Vancouver?Vancouver is the perfect place to find balance. From yoga and hiking, to skiing and snowshoeing; fine dining or cheap eats; we have it all. The talent, the city, the beautiful outdoor setting; it all makes for an enticing location to live, work and play. Our city is growing and quickly becoming a hub for technological innovation. Hootsuite is a huge part of that movement and we want you to join us for the ride. Come and learn from the Front-end Engineers driving this transformation and experience Vancouver as the heart of Canadian Tech.Get to know Hootsuite through:Facebook | Twitter | LinkedIn | Google+ | Instagram | YouTube
job_requirements: Required Skills & Experience:● Experience developing with JavaScript● Familiarity with modern frameworks like Backbone, React, or Angular● Familiarity with a JavaScript unit-testing framework, such as Jasmine● Interest in automation, including writing unit and integration tests● Experience building and shipping your own personal projects● A desire to move fast, ship things, make customers happy, and get things done● Experience integrating APIs from major social media platforms (Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, Google+)Bonus Assets:● A link to your github account and personal projects you've shipped● So much passion for front-end software engineering that you do it for fun● Desire for tackling difficult problems, and to make an impact on a global user baseOpen To All Majors:No
